descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is pleased to offer to the market this pristine four-bedroom duplex penthouse. Located on the right-hand side of Shoreline Apartments on the prestigious Palm Jumeirah, this penthouse makes a grand lifestyle statement. 
First Floor
As you enter the property you are welcomed in to the wide hallway which leads in to a well-proportioned triple-height main room with a combined open plan living, lounge and dining area as well as a guest bedroom and a spacious terrace where unending views of the Dubai coastline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and of course the magnificent Arabian Gulf can be seen.  
The main room connects to a semi-open kitchen that comes fully equipped to be able to accommodate everything from cozy morning breakfasts to more elaborate weekend dinners with family and friends. The first floor also contains staff quarters.
Second Floor
After taking the well-designed staircase to the upper floor you are welcomed by a second family lounge as well as three principal bedrooms which offer en-suite bathrooms and walk-in wardrobes.
The property is being sold vacant on transfer for the new happy owner to move in on an immediate basis. Enquire today for more information or to set up viewing appointments. (Andreas)']

About Pearl Jumeirah
Pearl Jumeirah by Meraas Development is a project with a lot of unique selling points.
Announced in 2010, this is reclaimed land right off Jumeirah which also applies Jumeirah construction by-laws on the peninsula. Even though it is located right off Jumeirah, it has freehold title.
The peninsula offers 300 residential plots and the master-development also incorporates a 90,000 sq. ft. retail area, a mosque, educational facilities and large open spaces.
Many different factors affect prices, such as plot size, location of the plot (sea facing vs internal), original price etc.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sothebys International Realty is pleased to represent this ultra-modern 6 bedroom villa located in the prestigious area of Jumeirah 3. 
The unique 16,000 sq.ft. layout hides the villa with over 12 feet high walls protecting the full-length glass shell design that looks inward for the gorgeous views of a central courtyard with ample outdoor space next to beautiful water feature sculpture designed by owners themselves.
The dining area is one of the many gems of this house. The brass base for the dining table is fitted through the marble flooring with an ultra-thick glass top and designed intricately matching the pattern of the chandelier fixed on the ceiling. There is a Boffi show kitchen in the dining area where as the main dirty-kitchen is located in the basement next to the maid's rooms with an industrial cooking equipment. The entire home is fitted with top-notch Lutron automated smart lighting and motorized curtain system.
The bedrooms are all purposefully located on the first floor accessed through a light-well style staircase or an Otis Gen2 private elevator. The bedrooms are all interconnected through a wrap-around sky-lit corridor while they look inwards to the stunning masterpiece that is the central courtyard. The center courtyard also gives access to the open-air lounge area looking over the signature overflow pool with an underground balancing tank and a Jacuzzi, finished in the continuously matching Roman Travertine as the rest of the villa.
The basement floor's main feature is a spacious office with access from inside & outside the villa and featuring two safe rooms with Chubb Security doors and reinforced concrete walls. This floor includes a fully-featured Home theatre with 4K UHD projector and screen with Dolby surround-sound system and an air-conditioned spacious 5 car parking garage.
Contact us today to experience this extraordinary with a private viewing arranged for you."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionA stunning find in a spectacular project by Meraas. This 2BR is located on a high floor in one of the best buildings in Bluewaters.
Located in Building 7, which is one of the buildings directly framing Ain Dubai, with full, open views of the sea and right on the main retail and F & B area of Bluewaters Island.
Secure a property in Dubai s latest mega-project that is the city island retreat right off JBR. This is a great investment opportunity to purchase exclusive, luxury real estate within a world-class entertainment district. As an end-user, you will own an extremely liquid asset, that will be ready to sell or put up for lease at any time.
What makes Bluewaters Island such a great project to invest in?
It is a federal project that hosts the largest observation in the world! Only 10 residential buildings have been developed on the island, which makes the project very unique, limited and desirable. The low and controlled supply of residences increases the value of your investment here, along with access to 200 retail & dining concepts on the island, the world-famous Caesars Palace and direct pedestrian crossing to JBR.
This brand-new 1BR that comes with:
* Open plan, modern living space
* Floor-to-ceiling windows for full sea views and natural sunlight
* Bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms
* Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances
* Fine finishing with wooden flooring, soft metallic fixtures, Italian sanitary ware and minimalistic style
* Private parking
* Three modes of transport into and out of the island, with direct SZR access!
As a Bluewaters specialist I can also show you a number of properties available in this incredible project by Meraas. A developer well-known for bringing creative living concepts to life.
Call now for more information on the best option for island living in the middle of the city!
fäm Properties
